languages.text: "Вашему миру, ковальне в царстве трупа, выпала честь — стать горнилом будущей победы, на острие которой будем мы, Несущие Слово, и те из вас, кто сумеет превозмочь наветы обманных идолов. Из испепеляющего пламени Кьявы Гамма выйдут орудия, чья поступь возвестит о пришествии нового века — века, овеянного славой и величием Хаоса Неделимого!"

traits.locale_text: "Вашему миру, ковальне в царстве трупа, выпала честь — стать горнилом будущей победы, на острие которой будем мы, Несущие Слово, и те из вас, кто сумеет превозмочь наветы обманных идолов. Из испепеляющего пламени Кьява Гамма выйдут орудия, чья поступь возвестит о пришествии нового века — века, овеянного славой и величием Хаоса Неделимого!"

languages.text: "Your world, a foundry in the realm of corpses, was given the honour of serving as the crucible of the oncoming victory, and we, the Word Bearers, shall be at the tip of it, as well as those of you who can overcome the slander of the false idols. The incinerating fires of Kiava Gamma will birth weapons whose advance heralds the coming of a new age — an age wreathed by the glory and resplendence of Chaos Undivided!"
languages.original_text: "Вашему миру, ковальне в царстве трупа, выпала честь — стать горнилом будущей победы, на острие которой будем мы, Несущие Слово, и те из вас, кто сумеет превозмочь наветы обманных идолов. Из испепеляющего пламени Кьявы Гамма выйдут орудия, чья поступь возвестит о пришествии нового века — века, овеянного славой и величием Хаоса Неделимого!"

traits.locale_text: "Your world, a smithy in the Corpse's realm, was given the honor of serving as the crucible of the oncoming victory, at the tip of which shall be we, the Word Bearers, and those of you who can overcome the libels of false idols. The incinerating fires of Kiava Gamma will birth weapons whose advance heralds the coming of a new age — an age framed by the glory and resplendence of Chaos Undivided!"

"Your world, a smithy in the Corpse's realm, was given the honor of serving as the crucible of the oncoming victory, at the tip of which shall be we, the Word Bearers, and those of you who can overcome the libels of false idols. The incinerating fires of Kiava Gamma will birth weapons whose advance heralds the coming of a new age — an age framed by the glory and resplendence of Chaos Undivided!"

The incinerating fires of Kiava Gamma will birth weapons whose advance heralds the coming of a new age — an age wreathed by the glory and resplendence of Chaos Undivided!"

The incinerating fires of Kiava Gamma will birth weapons whose advance heralds the coming of a new age — an age wreathed by the glory and resplendence of Chaos Undivided!"

The incinerating fires of Kiava Gamma will birth weapons whose advance heralds the coming of a new age — an age wreathed by the glory and resplendence of Chaos Undivided!"

The incinerating fires of Kiava Gamma will birth weapons whose advance heralds the coming of a new age — an age wreathed by the glory and resplendence of Chaos Undivided!"

languages.text: “你们的世界，无数尸体的铸造厂，将会成为荣耀的坩埚，迎接即将到来的胜利。而我们，怀言者，以及你们之中那些摒弃了伪神与异端邪说的人，将会站在这个世界的顶端。基亚瓦伽马星的熊熊烈焰将会铸造新的战争机械。这些机械会隆隆前进，昭示着新世代的到来！那将会是个被无分混沌的辉煌与荣耀所笼罩的时代！”
languages.original_text: "Your world, a foundry in the realm of corpses, was given the honour of serving as the crucible of the oncoming victory, and we, the Word Bearers, shall be at the tip of it, as well as those of you who can overcome the slander of the false idols. The incinerating fires of Kiava Gamma will birth weapons whose advance heralds the coming of a new age — an age wreathed by the glory and resplendence of Chaos Undivided!"

traits.locale_text: “你们的世界，无数尸体的铸造厂，将会成为荣耀的坩埚，迎接即将到来的胜利。而我们，怀言者，以及你们之中那些摒弃了伪神与异端邪说的人，将会站在这个世界的顶端。基亚瓦伽马星的熊熊烈焰将会铸造新的战争机械。这些机械会隆隆前进，昭示着新世代的到来！那将会是个被无分混沌的辉煌与荣耀所笼罩的时代！”

languages.text: «Vuestro mundo, una forja en el reino de los cadáveres, tuvo del honor de servir como crisol de la victoria inminente; nosotros, los Portadores de la Palabra, estaremos al frente de esta, así como aquellos de vosotros que superéis las calumnias de los falsos ídolos. Los fuegos de Kiava Gamma darán a luz a las armas cuyo avance anuncie la llegada de una nueva era, ¡una era coronada por la gloria y el resplandor del Caos Absoluto!».
languages.original_text: "Your world, a foundry in the realm of corpses, was given the honour of serving as the crucible of the oncoming victory, and we, the Word Bearers, shall be at the tip of it, as well as those of you who can overcome the slander of the false idols. The incinerating fires of Kiava Gamma will birth weapons whose advance heralds the coming of a new age — an age wreathed by the glory and resplendence of Chaos Undivided!"

traits.locale_text: «Vuestro mundo, una forja en el reino de los cadáveres, tuvo del honor de servir como crisol de la victoria inminente; nosotros, los Portadores de la Palabra, estaremos al frente de esta, así como aquellos de vosotros que superéis las calumnias de los falsos ídolos. Los fuegos de Kiava Gamma darán a luz a las armas cuyo avance anuncie la llegada de una nueva era, ¡una era coronada por la gloria y el resplandor del Caos Absoluto!».

languages.text: 「汝らの世界である死体を生む製造工場は、来たるべき坩堝の勝利を掴むべく、厳しい試練を全うするという栄誉を与えられた。そして我々ワードベアラーは、偽りの偶像の誣言を乗り越えられた者達と共にその先にいる。キアヴァ・ガンマの焦げ付くような炎は、来たる新たな時代の前触れを告げる武器を産むだろう…分かたれざる渾沌の栄光と輝きに囲まれた新たな時代が来るのだ！」
languages.original_text: "Your world, a foundry in the realm of corpses, was given the honour of serving as the crucible of the oncoming victory, and we, the Word Bearers, shall be at the tip of it, as well as those of you who can overcome the slander of the false idols. The incinerating fires of Kiava Gamma will birth weapons whose advance heralds the coming of a new age — an age wreathed by the glory and resplendence of Chaos Undivided!"

traits.locale_text: 「汝らの世界である死体を生む製造工場は、来たるべき坩堝の勝利を掴むべく、厳しい試練を全うするという栄誉を与えられた。そして我々ワードベアラーは、偽りの偶像の誣言を乗り越えられた者達と共にその先にいる。キアヴァ・ガンマの焦げ付くような炎は、来たる新たな時代の前触れを告げる武器を産むだろう…分かたれざる渾沌の栄光と輝きに囲まれた新たな時代が来るのだ！」

languages.text: "Eurer Welt, einer Gießerei im Reich der Leichen, wurde die Ehre zuteil, als Schmiede für den kommenden Sieg zu gelten, und wir, die Word Bearers, werden ganz vorne stehen, genau wie jene von Euch, die die Verleumdungen der falschen Idole überwinden können. Die lodernden Feuer von Kiava Gamma werden Waffen gebären, deren Vorstoß von einem neuen Zeitalter kündet – einem Zeitalter umrankt vom Ruhm und der Pracht des Ungeteilten Chaos!"
languages.original_text: "Your world, a foundry in the realm of corpses, was given the honour of serving as the crucible of the oncoming victory, and we, the Word Bearers, shall be at the tip of it, as well as those of you who can overcome the slander of the false idols. The incinerating fires of Kiava Gamma will birth weapons whose advance heralds the coming of a new age — an age wreathed by the glory and resplendence of Chaos Undivided!"

traits.locale_text: "Eurer Welt, einer Gießerei im Reich der Leichen, wurde die Ehre zuteil, als Schmiede für den kommenden Sieg zu gelten, und wir, die Word Bearers, werden ganz vorne stehen, genau wie jene von Euch, die die Verleumdungen der falschen Idole überwinden können. Die lodernden Feuer von Kiava Gamma werden Waffen gebären, deren Vorstoß von einem neuen Zeitalter kündet – einem Zeitalter umrankt vom Ruhm und der Pracht des Ungeteilten Chaos!"

languages.text: « Votre monde, une fonderie dans le royaume des cadavres, a reçu l'honneur de servir de creuset à la victoire à venir. Et nous, Word Bearers, serons à l'avant-garde avec ceux d'entre vous qui sauront s'émanciper des calomnies répandues par les fausses idoles. Les feux ardents de Kiava Gamma donneront naissance à des armes dont les avancées annoncent l'avènement d'un nouvel âge... un âge illuminé de la gloire et de la splendeur du Chaos indivisible ! »
languages.original_text: "Your world, a foundry in the realm of corpses, was given the honour of serving as the crucible of the oncoming victory, and we, the Word Bearers, shall be at the tip of it, as well as those of you who can overcome the slander of the false idols. The incinerating fires of Kiava Gamma will birth weapons whose advance heralds the coming of a new age — an age wreathed by the glory and resplendence of Chaos Undivided!"

traits.locale_text: « Votre monde, une fonderie dans le royaume des cadavres, a reçu l'honneur de servir de creuset à la victoire à venir. Et nous, World Bearers, serons à l'avant-garde avec ceux d'entre vous qui sauront s'émanciper des calomnies répandues par les fausses idoles. Les feux ardents de Kiava Gamma donneront naissance à des armes dont les avancées annoncent l'avènement d'un nouvel âge... un âge illuminé de la gloire et de la splendeur du Chaos indivisible ! »

languages.text: "Dünyanıza, cesetler diyarındaki bu dökümhaneye; yaklaşan zaferin potası olarak hizmet etme onuru verildi. Sahte mabutların yalanlarını aşabilenleriniz ile biz Vahyedenler, birlikte bu zaferin habercisi olacağız. Kiava Gama'nın yakıcı ateşleri; ilerleyişi yeni bir çağın, Yek Kaos'un ihtişamı ve görkemiyle süslenmiş bir çağın gelişini müjdeleyen silahlar doğuracak!"
languages.original_text: "Your world, a foundry in the realm of corpses, was given the honour of serving as the crucible of the oncoming victory, and we, the Word Bearers, shall be at the tip of it, as well as those of you who can overcome the slander of the false idols. The incinerating fires of Kiava Gamma will birth weapons whose advance heralds the coming of a new age — an age wreathed by the glory and resplendence of Chaos Undivided!"

traits.locale_text: "Dünyanıza, cesetler diyarındaki bu dökümhaneye, yaklaşan zaferin potası olarak hizmet etme onuru verildi. Biz Vahyedenler ile bu zaferin habercisi, sahte putların yalanlarını aşabilenler olacak. Kiava Gama'nın yakıcı ateşleri; ilerleyişi yeni bir çağın, Yek Kaos'un ihtişamı ve görkemiyle süslenmiş bir çağın gelişini müjdeleyen silahlar doğuracak!"
